title: 260: Chris Harrison’s Replacement?? + Jed Finally Speaks?? + Chrissy Teigen’s Tweets + More!
itunes:title: 260: Chris Harrison’s Replacement?? + Jed Finally Speaks?? + Chrissy Teigen’s Tweets + More!
description:
(CW: Reading tweets from Chrissy Teigen - these tweets include self harm) Today The Broads do a little life and drama catch up, then they chat about their fave -Tayshia, a potential Chris Harrison replacement and what he will do if he gets fired, Jed’s podcast finally dropping, Luke P officially sued by “The Bachelor”, pre-teens and teens on social media, Chrissy Teigen’s tweets, their continued love for LVP, Pink’s performance with her daughter, and more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***BLENDERS: Go to BLENDERSEYEWEAR.COM and use code CHATTYVIP for 15% off!

***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 of the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

***FUNCTION OF BEAUTY: Go to FUNCTIONOFBEAUTY.COM/BROADS to take your quiz and save 20% on your first order!

***MEJURI: Head to MEJURI.COM/CHATTY for 10% off your first order!

***ANCIENT NUTRITION: Get 20% off your first order when you go to ANCIENTNUTRITION.COM and enter promo code CHATTY at checkout!

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
